medical_history.chief_complaint: Vague abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain developed approximately 24 hours ago and has been fairly persistent. The patient experienced anorexia and mild diarrhea since her last meal 24 hours ago. No fevers, chills, or sick contacts reported.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal illness.
